Sinopse: Manolo (Diego Peretti) is in midlife crisis. His marriage with Beatriz (Aitana Sánchez-Gijón) is on the verge of chaos, the routine of his work is unbearable, and communication with his two children and with life itself is disastrous. However, fate leads him to Antonio (Andoni Hernández), a 15-year-old Canarian boy with cancer but a very contagious vitality. His friendship with him, his mother (Goya Toledo), a fun food-deliverer (Jorge Garcia), and an extravagant nurse (Rosa María Sardà), among others, will be the beginning of a myriad of coincidences that will transform his life in this fun, magical, fascinating Christmas tale.
